creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: black, red dominate; satin stitch floral patterns with some birds; center square designs are applied and sewn on with a visible, yellow stitch; extended straps also embroidered with florals on red; black edging throughout; heavy; lined in dark blue; dark in appearance
title: Baby Carrier
